attributes.action: Make it against the law for any person to shoot or kill any animal or seal for personal or finacial gain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Seals are becoming more at risk of being shot or attacked by the human race. This is because fish farms sell salmon which the seals also eat. Please make it against the law for any person to shoot or kill any animal or seal for personal or finacial gain as this is cruelty and should be stopped.

I hope you understand what i am trying to say.
